tool_description: Free crypto news from financial institutions.
title: Free crypto news

api_list.name: get news from specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: crypto news from all sources
api_list.description: crypto news from all sources from global financial institutions and close markets

import requests
